docs.snippet: The man police say opened fire with a gun from his checked baggage at a Florida airport had a history of mental health issues — some of which followed his military service in Iraq — and was receiving psychological treatment at his home...
docs.lead_paragraph: The man police say opened fire with a gun from his checked baggage at a Florida airport had a history of mental health issues — some of which followed his military service in Iraq — and was receiving psychological treatment at his home in Alaska, his relatives said Friday after the deadly shooting.

headline.main: Family: Shooting Suspect 'Lost His Mind' After Tour in Iraq
headline.print_headline: Family: Shooting Suspect 'Lost His Mind' After Tour in Iraq

docs.lead_paragraph: North Carolina's new Democratic governor has formally started his effort to expand Medicaid to more of the working poor in the state, even as Republicans in Washington bear down on repealing the federal health care law that offers this increased coverage.

headline.main: N. Carolina Gov Formally Begins Medicaid Expansion Pursuit

docs.snippet: Four African-Americans accused of attacking an 18-year-old white man with special needs while making anti-white racial taunts in an assault broadcast on Facebook were ordered held without bail by a Chicago judge on Friday....
